alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:21PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Catoosa, northwestern Walker and northern Dade Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from 6 miles north of Orme to Chattanooga, and moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Lookout Mountain, Lakeview, Blue Spring, Cole City, Wildwood, Fairview, Stephensville, Boynton, Beaumont, Chattanooga Valley, New England, Morganville, Hooker and Indian Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
